hero.title: Shaping Young Minds for a Bright Future
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Shishu Vidya Nikethan, where education meets innovation. We nurture creativity, discipline, and excellence in every child.

about.title: About Us
about.aboutDescription: Our school is a place where learning goes beyond textbooks. We are committed to providing quality education that helps students grow academically, socially, and morally. With experienced teachers and modern facilities, we focus on shaping confident and responsible individuals.
about.whoWeAreText: Our school was founded more than 25 years ago with the aim of providing quality education in a disciplined and supportive environment. Over the years, it has grown with the trust of parents and the dedication of our teachers, creating a place where students feel safe, valued, and encouraged to learn. We believe that true education goes beyond academics. By blending strong moral values with modern teaching practices, we focus on the overall development of each child, helping them grow academically, socially, and emotionally at their own pace.
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide quality education in a safe and encouraging environment where students develop strong academic skills, good values, and confidence to succeed in life.
about.visionText: Our vision is to create a learning community that inspires students to become responsible, skilled, and compassionate individuals who are prepared for future challenges.
about.description: Shishu Vidya Nikethan is dedicated to providing a safe, nurturing, and stimulating learning environment where children can grow and thrive.

learningApproach.title: Modern Learning Approach at Our School
learningApproach.subtitle: Our school follows a modern and student-focused learning approach. We help students learn better by supporting classroom teaching with structured notes, key learning points, and practice questions based on educational content.
learningApproach.easyNotesDesc: Long lessons are converted into short, clear, and easy-to-understand notes for students. Making complex topics simple and digestible for better learning.
learningApproach.importantPointsDesc: Key concepts and exam-relevant topics are highlighted to help students focus on what matters most. Ensuring efficient study time and better exam preparation.
learningApproach.practiceQuestionsDesc: Students get topic-based practice questions to revise and test their understanding. Building confidence through regular practice and self-assessment.

faq.q1: What makes Shishu Vidya Nikethan different?
faq.a1: We focus on Modern Learning Approach with structured notes, engaging practice questions, and consistent progress tracking to ensure every student succeeds.
faq.q2: What subjects and grades do you cover?
faq.a2: We offer comprehensive education from Nursery to Class 10, covering all core subjects including Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, Social Studies, and Computer Science.
faq.q3: How do you track student progress?
faq.a3: We use regular assessments, personalized feedback, and parent-teacher meetings to ensure continuous monitoring and improvement of each student's academic journey.
